comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: Found a version of this photo in The Bisbee Daily Review, issue September 16, 1913 [the scratched date is September 11, 1913] (The Library of Congress, Cronicling America). Above is written: "MEXICAN REBELS HELP THEMSELVES TO GENERAL FELIX DIAZ'S 73,000-ACRE ESTATE"; below: "General Lucio Blanco signing titles to confiscated 73,000-acre estate of General Felix Diaz."..... chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn84024827/1913-09-16/ed-... Dr. Roberto Duarte
